parameter.name: dayValue
parameter.label: Day Value
parameter.description: The value which will be send when motion is detected during the day.

parameter.name: nightValue
parameter.label: Night Value
parameter.description: The value which will be send when motion is detected during the night.

parameter.name: start
parameter.label: Start of Day
parameter.description: The start time of the day (hh:mm).

parameter.name: end
parameter.label: End of Day
parameter.description: The end time of the day (hh:mm).

parameter.name: restoreValue
parameter.label: Restore Value
parameter.description: Select what should happen when there is no motion anymore.
